about_the_game:
Anaïs, a porn influencer, plunges into a whirlwind of sensations that defy her understanding and awaken her deepest anxieties. Unable to escape the clutches of her agoraphobia, insomnia becomes her constant companion, fueling her relentless pursuit of carnal satisfaction.



The reasons behind this disorder remain shrouded in mystery, but her condition serves only to exacerbate her nymphomaniacal instincts. Though she occasionally attempts to leave her claustrophobic apartment, agoraphobia holds her in its relentless grip, like an invisible prison, limiting her movements and her freedom.

However, an occasional lover, perhaps driven by a mixture of desire and compassion, emerges in her tumultuous life. After a night of fiery passion, he offers her a mysterious vape liquid, a desperate attempt to bring some relief to her restless mind.

Anaïs accepts the offer, desperate for a glimpse of sleep, even if temporary. The nicsalt liquid calms her anxieties, plunging her into a deep sleep, where she finally finds refuge from the storms of her troubled mind.

However, upon awakening, Anaïs is thrust into a world that defies all notions of reality. A haze of eroticism permeates the air, distorting the boundaries between dream and wakefulness. It's as if she has been torn from an erotic dream and thrust into a reality where the most intimate desires are brought to life with surreal intensity.

She finds herself trapped in a whirlwind of temptation and pleasure, where each step sinks her deeper into a labyrinth of lust and seduction. The line between what is real and what is imaginary fades, leaving her questioning her own sanity.

Was the liquid she consumed a drug? Or has she been transported to a parallel world, where darkest desires come to life? Or even more disturbing, is all this intrinsically linked to her agoraphobia, a grotesque manifestation of her deepest fears?

She struggles to find answers as she is dragged into a twisted world, where desire reigns supreme and reality dissolves into a sea of lust and pleasure. Though captivated by this forbidden world, a sense of impending danger haunts her, urging her to desperately seek an escape route.

Now, Anaïs is faced with a harrowing dilemma: to remain in this world of illusory pleasure or to fight to find her way back to reality, where the shadows of her agoraphobia continue to haunt her.



You will be presented with its interface as soon as you open the game. On the main screen, you will find options such as "Start", "Load" (to continue saved games), and "Config". Accessing an image Gallery from the Gallery button will also be possible. Remember that your language choice needs to happen BEFORE starting or loading your game. This game has an approximate minimum duration of 3 hours.

To advance the story, click on the text to proceed or use the "Auto" option if you want the scenes to follow automatically. This is a great way to relax and get lost in the story, especially in emotional moments!

content_descriptors.notes: Nudity and explicit sex are the main features of this story. Anais is almost always naked or wearing suggestive clothing. There are some quick scenes with tobacco consumption (no alcohol consumption, only empty bottles). Contains explicit sex scenes, bodily fluids, and some vulgar language.

name: Sperm Into Labia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
